column5: Headed out over the last few days with some friends to the Niagara Bar for Lakers.  Was a tough go with the poor weather and the river was in rough shape. Tried out by the bar but was getting too rough.  Headed in to the river for some drifts.  I landed a bow after many, many drifts and re ties.....   Next up Joe landed a nice brown..Looks like a bow in these pics though, maybe it was a bow....   Close to calling it a day I landed my first Laker!   Was truly surprising how strong these fish are and how they can stay on the bottom.  I thought I had an anchor on at first....  Was a great time out there with great folks.  Just wish the results had been better...  Sherriff
WOW !!!  That's a super laker Jeff.  Congrats.
Better results?  I'd say you did pretty good man.  Beauty bow and that laker is sweet lookin, is that your first?  Nice job Sherriff.  Corn Nug
Great pics and report! Some real good lookin' fish there!
Wish the results had been better, sheesh, I'd be happy with just one Nice fish there bud.  Great report.  Joey

Ya Corn Nug, that is my first.  As for poor results, there were a number of boats out there and many did not get anything over two or three days.  I was lucky for sure and can't complain...  Was a good trip.  Sherriff
nice report & pics guys way to go  that pic you thought was a brown,i think is a bow,but just the same great pics ,that laker looks real nice too
Nice fishies Jeff ! Thought it was going to be a post about bar hopping in Niagara Falls. Them lakers can be a handful to hang on to eh ! Muscular buggers.
Nice fish.  That is alot better then the rest of us who are sitting around waiting for ice.
Nice work "Sheriff" (still feels wrong calling you by the sell-out name) looks like fun at lakerpalooza
Nice work and pic-good thing you're better looking than your bro..
Nice report, congrats on the first laker.  First one of the season, or first one ever?  Mike
Great to see your persistance paid off.  Nice looking catch there.
Fishboy, Yes, I am much better looking!  LOL  Setomonkey, yes, first ever.  Was a great way to end 2006..  Wayne, serious muscle and in that current it seems to be even stronger....  Sherriff
Hefty looking laker too Sheriff.  Alot of kinda skinny now.  Good stuff.  See ya again one of these days.
